definition: monk (Sanskrit: Sramana, originally refers to north India)/Buddhist monk

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

pinyin: shang1 han2 sha1 men2 shi4 jun1

sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙門氏菌檢測的熒光抗體技術爲能被廣範應用。

sentences.english: "Salmonella doubles every 20 minutes under ideal conditions," Keener said.
sentences.chinese: 基納說，在理想環境下，沙門氏菌每20分鐘複製。

sentences.english: "I'm a strong 12)advocate for the separation of church and state, " said Jeffrey Selman, one of the parents.
sentences.chinese: 其中一位家長傑佛瑞沙門表示。

sentences.english: Salmonella is the most common bacterial form of food poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 沙門氏菌是一種最普遍的引起食物中毒的病菌。

sentences.english: Consequently, the FA procedure for Salmonella detection has not been in routine use.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙門氏菌檢測的熒光抗體技術爲能被廣範應用。

sentences.english: But are wallets a more serious menace than salmonella-encrusted kitchen sinks?
sentences.chinese: 但是，錢夾比攜帶沙門氏菌的廚房洗碗池更具威脅嗎？

sentences.english: Isn't that like KFC advertising salmonella chicken?" --Jay Leno
sentences.chinese: 這難道不就是像肯德基做廣告說，要賣沙門氏菌雞嗎？

sentences.english: Salmonellae are more widespread than is commonly comprehended.
sentences.chinese: 沙門氏菌的散播比平常所瞭解的更爲廣泛。

sentences.english: That's Gotama the contemplative, sitting surrounded by a large assembly, teaching the Dhamma.
sentences.chinese: 那是沙門喬達摩爲衆人圍繞，正端坐說法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the factors of affecting the efficacy of Salmonella Typhimurium (ST) enteritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影響鼠傷寒沙門氏菌腸炎療效的因素。

sentences.english: Listeria monocytogenes and Salmonella than some of the common E. coli are more lethal.
sentences.chinese: 李斯特菌比常見的沙門氏菌和某些大腸桿菌更爲致命。

sentences.english: Results Minimum value of Salmonellae in samples was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 結果得出樣品中沙門菌的最低檢出限。

sentences.english: Salmonellosis is a major problem in most countries.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數國家沙門氏菌病是一個主要問題。

sentences.english: Salmonellosis is an infection caused by bacteria called Salmonella.
sentences.chinese: 什麼是沙門菌病，感染症狀是什麼？

sentences.english: Objective To study the biological characteristics of the Salmonella agone .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究阿貢納沙門菌的生物學特性。

sentences.english: This strain specifically, Salmonella enteritidis, is found in chickens.
sentences.chinese: 腸炎沙門氏菌則主要在雞體內發現。

definition: tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
boundless life (expression of good wishes)/Amitayus, the Buddha of measureless life, good fortune and wisdom
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
Kumarajiva c. 334-413, Buddhist monk and translator of Zen texts
Avatamsaka sutra of the Huayan school/also called Buddhavatamsaka-mahavaipulya Sutra, the Flower adornment sutra or the Garland sutra
pinyin: da4 fang1 guang3 Fo2 hua2 yan2 jing1

definition: Prince Ananda, cousin of the Buddha and his closest disciple
incantation (Sanskrit: dharani)/religious chant (promoting virtue and obstructing evil)
